#Deployment of USCM forces - USCM should be following their role objectives. - Medics should heal their comrades, a specialist should be using their equipment. - Squad leaders should always listen to command. - Squad members should always follow the orders of the squad leader. - Department heads (RD, CMP, CMO) should not deploy. - All marines should deploy when possible.
##Ship crew may deploy, where relevant. - Maint techs may assist building FOB. - Doctors may treat marines within the FOB. - Combat Correspondents focus on reporting on combat and disengage when attacked.
